```{r, global,setup, file=c('common/crz_db_con.R', 'crz_summary.R'), include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
```

## First row

### Total contracts amount
```{r}
flexdashboard::valueBox(paste(crz_contracts_summary_tbl$ContractsAmount, "mld€", sep = ""), caption = "Celková hodnota zmlúv", icon="fa-tag")
```

### Average contract size
```{r}
flexdashboard::valueBox(paste(crz_contracts_summary_tbl$AverageContract,"€", sep = ""), caption = "Priemerná hodnota kontraktu", icon = "fa-comments")
```

### Biggest contract amount
```{r}
flexdashboard::valueBox(paste(crz_contracts_summary_tbl$MaxContract, "mld€", sep = ""), caption = "Najväčší kontrakt", icon="fa-tag")
```

```{r}
flexdashboard::valueBox(crz_contracts_summary_tbl$Contractors, caption = "Počet zadávateľov", icon = "fa-comments")
```

### Suppliers quantity
